comment: Vive la France,Vive la Liberty! How horrible this attack on civilisation by this rabid cult! We stand with you,we grieve with you.

(m / multi-sentence

            :op1 (v / vive-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :ARG1 (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "France")))
            :op2 (v2 / vive-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :ARG1 (l / liberty)))
      :snt2 (h / horrible
            :degree (s / so)
            :domain (a2 / attack-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / cult
                        :mod (r / rabies)
                        :mod (t / this))
                  :ARG1 (c3 / civilize-01)
                  :mod (t2 / this)))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (s2 / stand-11
                  :ARG1 (w / we)
                  :ARG2 (y / you))
            :op2 (g / grieve-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 y)))
